EmailTemplate.name: IPRD Submission Template
EmailTemplate.subject: New IP Request - {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.Name} has been Submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
You have successfully submitted {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.Name} IP Request for approval. It is now pending IP Management Team approval.
For more details, click {!CMOS_BU_IP_Request__c.Link}.
Thanks.
NOTE: This is a system generated message. Please do not reply to this email.
